schema.terminal.type: One of: powershell, windows-terminal, bash, iterm (null if not configured)
schema.terminal.configured_at: ISO timestamp of when terminal was set
schema.supported_terminals: Reference of available terminal options by platform

_meta.first_run_behavior: When terminal.type is null, the /pure-ralph command should prompt user to select a terminal from supported_terminals matching their platform, then persist the choice
